readiness_probe_log.title: MongoDB Readiness Probe Log
readiness_probe_log.description: JSON log format for MongoDB Kubernetes readiness probe

sample.line: {"level":"info","ts":"2025-07-17T15:58:37.842Z","msg":"logging configuration: &{Filename:/var/log/mongodb-mms-automation/readiness.log MaxSize:5 MaxAge:0 MaxBackups:5 LocalTime:false Compress:false size:0 file:<nil> mu:{state:0 sema:0} millCh:<nil> startMill:{done:{_:{} v:0} m:{state:0 sema:0}}}"}
{"level":"debug","ts":"2025-07-17T15:59:07.926Z","msg":"Indicated a wait Step, status: WaitAllRsMembersUp, started at 2025-07-17T15:58:47Z but hasn't finished yet. Marking the probe as ready"}
